page.title: 04GILES continued
page.content: crosses me over the main road.I walk up the lane to my school.At school I go down to the playground to wait for the bell for assembly.We line up and walk into the hall.One of the teachers reads a story and then we sing a hymn.Then we go into our classrooms.We have our lessons next.I like maths best.At 10.40 we have playtime for twenty minutes.I play marbles or run-across at playtime.Marbles are round pieces of glass.At 11.00 am we go in for lessons again. Then at 12.15 we have our lunch.After lunch we have a long playtime until 1.30 pm.Then we have art and craft.This is my favourite lesson.We have a little playtime of ten minutes. School ends at 3.30 pm.Mum comes to pick me up.We have a cooked tea at about 6.00.I play model aeroplanes until bedtime at 9pm.
